thread.title: Pandora Shares Rise on Copyright Development
thread.title_full: Pandora Shares Rise on Copyright Development - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Pandora Shares Rise on Copyright Development
text:
Pandora Media Inc. said a copyright opinion issued Friday landed in its favor, potentially influencing an upcoming board’s decision surrounding royalty rights for the Internet radio broadcaster’s next five years.
Shares in the company rose as much as 15% on strong volume Monday as investors digested the news. In recent trading, shares had given back a large chunk of that gain and were up 5.3% to $20.74.
